review: This product already has more than 27000 reviews so it doesn't need another one but I have to say that I LOVE LOVE LOVE the Amazon Fire TV.  I have a "Smart TV" and it's a good TV but sometimes bring up some of the programs was slow and prime didn't work well with it... So I got the Amazon Fire when it was on sale for $79.00.  It is so easy to use and it works so smoothly.  They keep adding new programs and I can't even keep up with all of them but for Netflix, HBOGO, Amazon Prime, Hutu Plus, Facebook, games, apps, it's just amazing.  I hardly watch regular TV anymore... and, oh yes, I bought one for the bedroom TV.
